justification: "participants recorded their relative preference between the two gift cards using a sliding scale from -30 to 30"
construct: preference strength / relative preference between gift cards

justification: "participants were prompted to either press the "Left" button ... or press the "Right" button to indicate that they would prefer the right gift card"
construct: choice of gift card / binary decision

justification: "participants were asked what percentage of the time they paid attention to each attribute (on a scale of 0 to 100)"
construct: attention to each attribute / attribute importance
